text.tspan: Prevalence, new cases and deaths from HIV/AIDS, World, 1990 to 2019
To fit all three measures on the same visualization the total number of people living with HIV has been divided by ten (i.e. in 2019 there were
Number of people living with HIV (x10)
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
